I will be speaking to post graduate students at the University of Ibadan in August, 2023, on how to implement various statistical concept in R. Such as:

* Design of Experiment
* Analysis of Variance
* Correlation
* Principal Component Analysis
* Cluster Analysis
* Data Wrangling
* Data Visualization
* Report Writing
